title: Rules to know a royall king, from a disloyall subject. With an exact account given of the jewels of the crowne of England. Whereunto is added, a touch-stone for a traitor. VVritten by the Kings friend, and a lover of the Common-wealth, Tho: Jordan.
author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?
publisher: Printed for Robert Wood and Edward Christopher,
